biography: Mikko, a competitor known for his strategic mind and unwavering focus, hails from Kurk Golf. While some might find his meticulous approach intimidating, those who know him best appreciate his dry wit and surprising sense of humor off the course.

Mikko has previously participated in the Hector Trophée. Although he has yet to capture the coveted Hector Trophée or the Victor Trophy, Mikko's dedication to the game and his relentless pursuit of improvement make him a formidable player to watch.

While Mikko is not currently slated to participate in Hector Trophée 2025, golf enthusiasts know that last-minute changes can always occur, leaving the door open for Mikko to potentially showcase his talents once more.
